casebody.data:
Jesse James EVANS, Appellant, v. A. C. ADERHOLD, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 7135. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 13, 1933. H. T. Nichols, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before BRYAN, FOSTER, and SIBLEY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
